data.question: What is the molecular weight of compound 1·½Et2O?

data.answer: The robustness of the polymers suggested by their structural features

data.question: What is the effect of the coordination of four halide ions on the Lewis acidity of AgI ion in the synthesis of compounds 3 and 4?
data.answer: It is expected to attenuate the Lewis acidity of AgI ion
